items.value: Spouse Abduction
Abduction of %10@
%02@ of %01@ has been captivated by the beauty and magnificence of %10@, the spouse of %12@ of %11@. Admiring %96b from the distance, %87b begins to fall in love and become obsessed.
%02@ of %01@ is completely obsessed and consumed by evil thoughts. %87a sent %00@ to abduct %10@.
%00@ has arrived at %11@.
%00@ has been caught and executed in attempting to abduct %10@.
%00@ has been caught but is secretly allowed by %12@ to continue the abduction in an attempt to get rid of %93b spouse probably because of hatred.
%12@ will not do anything about the abduction causing other honorable kings to despise %92b also.
%12@ assembled a search party to look for %10@.
%10@ has been abducted by %00@.
%00@ has failed to abduct %10@.
%11@ won the war. %10@ has been returned.
%11@ won the war. %10@ has committed suicide because %95b couldn't stand returning to someone %95b doesn't love.
%10@ tried to assassinate %97b new spouse, %02@ because of hatred. %95a was successful and is now the new ruler of %01@.
%10@ tried to assassinate %97b new spouse, %02@ because of hatred. %95a failed and has been executed.
%10@ declared war against %96b former spouse, %12@, because of hatred and anger.
%01@ won the war. %10@ will stay in the arms of %02@.
The news about the new spouse of %02@ has reached %11@. %12@ has found out about the abduction.
%12@ was enraged by the abduction and death of %10@. %91a declared war against %01@.
%12@ was enraged by the abduction of %10@. %91a declared war against %01@.
%12@ was enraged by the death of %10@. %91a declared war against %01@.
%00@ found that %10@ is missing. %83a immediately leaves the city before being detected.
%00@ immediately leaves the city before being detected.
